full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS BSKOR LAS, 'CHI KA MA'I SEMS CAN LA PHAN THABS BYA TSUL NYAM THAG DBUGS 'BYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027B (CES 'CHI KHA MA'I SEMS CAN LA PHAN THABS BYA TSUL NYAM THAG DBUGS 'BYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DENG DUS SNYIGS MAR GYUR BA'I DBANG GIS PHAL BA RNAMS LTA CI 'GRO BA MANG PO'I 'DREN PAR RLOM PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG 'CHI KA'I SEMS CAN GYI SNGAS MGOR SLEBS PA NA, BYIN RTEN MYANG DU 'JUG PA LAS PHAN PA'I THABS GZHAN MDZAD MI MKHYEN PA MANG
